title: South Africa: Dear Starbucks, Welcome to South Africa, a Place of Really Good Coffee
text:
South Africa: Massive Medicine Trials Will Change HIV Treatment 
Let us lay out the groundwork we have put in place for you as a first act of friendship (there is no need to hand the locals shiny trinkets, not to worry). 
We had a wave of coffee drinkers who made something called Moer Koffie. These were bearded dudes in ox-wagons,... South Africa
